prompts: Create a large, plant-based Pokemon with vibrant flowers and a sturdy body.
Imagine a Pokemon with a big flower on its back that can use powerful nature attacks.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon that blends elements of nature and poison.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, showcasing both beauty and strength.
Show me a Pokemon that has both a reptilian body and a blooming flower feature.
Make a creature that uses its floral appendages for both battle and healing.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique combination of colorful flowers and a sturdy frame.
